author: leif
msg: Upgrade to using Logkit 2.0.1 to take advantage of a fix for a bug where the System.out stream was being closed.

author: leif
msg: Fix a typo that was causing the System.out and/or System.err streams to be closed when the StreamTarget was closed.

author: leif
msg: Make it possible to specify a maximum period of time that log events can be held before they are sent.

author: leif
msg: Fix a problem where wrapped filters were not being closed on shutdown.  It is now possible to configure whether or not you want the wrapped filter to be closed.  But the default is to close it.
